Welcome to Streamerdex! We are a companion app for Twitch, a top streaming platform for fans to watch their favourite content creators live. Streamerdex aims to help you find your new favourite streamer in two easy steps: 

1. Click "Log in" and select the topics you are interested in from the list. 

2. Click "Get Started!" and you will be offered snapshots of top-rated streamers that relate to your chosen topics. Check out a preview of their content through our app, and if you like them, head on over to their channel on Twitch.
